TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Puljetji, title = Puljetji, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Puljetji} }

S.FORM: Puljetji Itiniay i Taiwu Cen no Pingtung ko Puljetji a niyaro', 138 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 456 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 447 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 9 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan94%, Bunun1%, roma2%.

Poljetji Itiniay i Taiwo Cen no Pingtong ko Poljetji a niyaro', 138 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 456 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 447 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 9 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan94%, Bonon1%, roma2%.
